definition: an event (or a course of events) that will inevitably happen in the future
details:
noun
- an event (or a course of events) that will inevitably happen in the future
= synonyms: fate
- the ultimate agency regarded as predetermining the course of events
= example: the ultimate agency regarded as predetermining the course of events
= synonyms: fate
- your overall circumstances or condition in life (including everything that happens to you)
= synonyms: fate
